summary: Completed frontend testing of multi-language support implementation. Verified Terms of Service, AML Policy, and demo pages load correctly. Theme-aware logo functionality working. Language selector present but translations not fully applied to page content.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard permission error when copying invoice number
ui_bugs.error: NotAllowedError: Failed to execute 'writeText' on 'Clipboard': Write permission denied

integration_issues.issue: Page content not translating when switching languages - header translates but main content remains in English
integration_issues.details: URL shows /fr/ and header shows French text, but Terms of Service content still displays in English

passed_tests: Terms of Service page loads at /pay/terms-of-service
All locale JSON files are valid and contain comprehensive translations
next-i18next config includes all 6 locales (en, fr, pt, es, de, nl)
Header translations working (Dynopay Wallet -> Portefeuille Dynopay)
All page layouts and components render properly
Demo page interactive elements (buttons, countdown, fee breakdown) working
Logo component switches between light/dark themes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix i18n translation application - page content not switching languages despite URL routing and header translations working. Verify getStaticProps and useTranslation implementation in Terms/AML pages. Consider adding clipboard permissions handling for copy functionality.
